item.title: Python for scientific computing
item.dc:creator: Marcos Duarte
item.description:
Python is a programming language that lets you work more quickly and integrate your systems more effectively. You can learn to use Python and see almost immediate gains in productivity and lower maintenance costs (python.org).

Python is also the name of the software with the most-widely used implementation of the language (maintained by the Python Software Foundation). This implementation is written mostly in the C programming language and it is nicknamed CPython. So, the following phrase, although with different meanings for the word Python, is correct: download Python (the software) to program in Python (the language) because Python (both) is great!

Read moreâ€¦ (8 min remaining to read)
